title: Newham: Newborn baby girl found in shopping bag
description: The girl, who is safe and well in hospital, was found wrapped in a towel in London.

title: Storm Isha: Dramatic weather change ahead with new storm named
description: Storm Isha will bring strong winds and rain from the weekend, with conditions also becoming less cold.

title: Bronson Battersby's sister does not blame social services for his death
description: The toddler is thought to have starved to death after his father suffered a fatal heart attack.

title: Urgent action is vital as measles outbreak spreads, says health boss
description: People have forgotten how miserable it is to have measles, a top health official warns.

title: Madonna sued by fans in New York over late concert start time
description: Two fans say the New York show started more than two hours late and did not end until after 01:00.

title: British Gas boss: I can't justify my Â£4.5m pay
description: Chris O'Shea, chief executive of Centrica, says he does not set his own pay but it is impossible to justify.

title: Ukraine war: Russian oil depot hit in Ukrainian drone attack
description: Fire breaks out over a large area in the Bryansk region, a day after another oil facility is targeted.

title: Snoop Dogg's daughter Cori Broadus cried after suffering stroke aged 24
description: Cori Broadcast says she "started breaking down crying" after being told she had had a stroke at 24.

title: Watch: How latest contestant bowed out of The Traitors
description: Thursday night's episode of the BBC hit programme had viewers on the edge of their seats.

title: Quiz of the week: Where did Denmark's new queen first call home?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what has been going on over the past seven days?
